column1: A black mark on the Companion registry.
A Callahan full-bore auto lock with customized trigger double cartridge thorough gauge, named Vera.
A very special level of hell.
Bedroom roleplay as dinosaurs, with Wash.
Being aroused at the sight of Mal naked in the desert.
Being raped to death, eaten and sewn into clothing. Hopefully in that order.
Being rough handled by Jayne and likin' it.
Being strangely turned on by River's skill with blades.
Being tortured by Niska 'til dead, over and over.
Burning the land and boiling the sea.
Desperately wanting to be a client of Inara's.
Dressin' up as a space cowboy for Hallowe'en.
Having a sexual fetish for Reavers.
Learning that the ship is not called "Firefly".
Leavin' atmo in an awful hurry.
Little geisha dolls with big heads that wobble.
People who talk at the theatre.
Sexin' up Kaylee in the engine room.
Stealing from the rich, selling to the poor.
The Bible's fuzzy teachings on kneecapping.
The hero of Canton, the man they call Jayne.
Two by two. Hands of blue.
Zoë's legs, and where her legs meet her back.
